sense.def:
Circumstances
so pogoji, ki vplivajo na dogodke v določenih razmerah.

seg.quote: In normal circumstances I would have resigned immediately.
She died without ever learning the circumstances of her grandfather's death.

sense.def:
Če želimo poudariti, da se nekaj ne bo zgodilo, rečemo, da se ne bo zgodilo
under any circumstances
.

seg.quote: Under no circumstances whatsoever will I support Mr Baldwin.

sense.def:
One's circumstances
so človekove življenjske razmere, zlasti količina denarja, ki ga ima.
